description: The requirement is to acquire 400 item(s) for the CT114 for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal. Inquiries regarding this requirement are to be submitted to each of the contract details below award contact.
full_summary:
# Washer Recessed Government Tender

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

We invite eligible bid submissions for the procurement of washer recessed items for the Department of National Defence.

### Procurement Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-247800/A
* **Procurement Category:** Good and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Procured Goods and Services

The main requirement is to acquire 400 washer recessed items for the CT114 aircraft. 

### Tender Process

Only Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series are eligible to submit proposals. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. Aero Precision Industries LLC
2. Aero Technical Components Inc.
3. Simex Defence Inc.
4. JHT Defense Inc.
5. Tower Aerospace Inc.
6. Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
7. Unisource Technology Inc.
8. L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
9. M1 Composites Technology
10. Rockwell Collins Canada

The tender documents will be e-mailed directly by the Contracting Officer to the Qualified SA Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

* Ryan Duncan, Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* Phone: (613) 292-9650
* Email: [Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca)

### Contracting Authority

* Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader, Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada 
* Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
* Civilian Aircraft Division - CAG
* Email: [jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Notice of Continuing Opportunity

A Notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more Suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.
